constructor-arg.value: select id, username, companyid from auth_user_profile, auth_users, prof_company_user where auth_users.userid = auth_user_profile.id and auth_users.userid = prof_company_user.userid and attrname = 'fffcCustomerId' and id in (select id from auth_user_profile where attrname='accountStatus' and attrvalue='open') and attrvalue = :customerId

select tm_account.account_number_display, tm_account.bill_group from prof_company_user, prof_company_account, tm_account where prof_company_user.companyid = prof_company_account.company_id and prof_company_account.account_id = tm_account.id and userid = :userId and account_number = :accountId

select bill.invoice_number, bill_summary.due_date from prof_company_user, prof_company_account, tm_account, bill_file_meta_data, bill, bill_summary where prof_company_user.userid = :userId and prof_company_account.company_id = prof_company_user.companyid and tm_account.id = prof_company_account.account_id and tm_account.account_number = :accountId and bill_file_meta_data.payment_group = tm_account.bill_group and bill_file_meta_data.bill_file_id = bill.bill_file_id and bill.account = tm_account.account_number and bill_summary.bill_id = bill.bill_id and bill_summary.due_date is not null order by bill_date desc limit 1

select count(*), sum(pay_amt), max(pay_date) from pmt_schedule, pmt_grouping where pmt_schedule.online_trans_id = pmt_grouping.online_trans_id and user_id = :userId and internal_account_number = :accountId and pay_date <= :date

select count(*), sum(pay_amt), max(pay_date) from pmt_schedule, pmt_grouping where pmt_schedule.online_trans_id = pmt_grouping.online_trans_id and user_id = :userId and internal_account_number = :accountId

select pay_date, pay_prior_days, expiry_cancel, expiry_date, pay_count, pay_amt_rule, pay_upto, pmt_automatic.automatic_id from pmt_automatic, pmt_automatic_grouping where pmt_automatic.automatic_id = pmt_automatic_grouping.automatic_id and pmt_automatic.user_id = :userId and pmt_automatic_grouping.internal_account_number = :accountId
